entry.articleIntro: Modern slavery is a hidden crime with over 40 million people around the world finding themselves in this horrific situation. Given that it is prohibited under international law in almost every country, why is it so widespread and pervasive? And what is being done to address it?

articleImage.title: Legatum Rise 1 India Nirdesh Atul Loke 035

articleBlocks.text: Denver Frederick, the host of The Business of Giving, had a conversation with Nick Grono, CEO of the Freedom Fund, a leader in the global movement to end modern slavery, for answers to these questions.
